Package org.forgerock.openam.services.push.dispatch

Class SignedJwtVerificationPredicate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.services.push.dispatch.AbstractPredicate
      • org.forgerock.openam.services.push.dispatch.SignedJwtVerificationPredicate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Predicate
    public class SignedJwtVerificationPredicate
extends AbstractPredicate
    Checks that the response to a message is appropriate for the user from whom it claims to be sent, by validating that the JWT sent in is signed by the appropriate user (their shared secret is retrieved from the user store).

    • Field Summary

      • SignedJwtVerificationPredicate

        public SignedJwtVerificationPredicate​(byte[] secret,
                                      String location)
        Create a new SNS Predicate, for use with the supplied secret and challenge.
        Parameters:
        secret - Used to verify JWT messages and content.
        location - JsonPointer String, used to locate the jwt within the JsonValue passed to perform().
